nodes.text: Stinna Draesinge Sha was a programmer and teacher at the Magrody Institute of Programmable Intelligence, and a brilliant AI programming theoretician.

Sha was taught by Professor Nasdra Magrody himself and she in turn instructed future Jedi, Cray Mingla. Sha studied Ssi-ruuvi droid starfighters and the entechment process, trying to discover how the aliens were able to capture a person's life energy.
After retiring, Sha was assassinated in 12 ABY, apparently by Phlygas Grynne, just before Han and Chief of State Leia Organa Solo went to Ithor to attend a Herd Meet.
